Flow.description: This Process fires on modifications of a story

value.stringValue:
AND(
ISCHANGED( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Sprint__c ), OR( ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Sprint__c) ), ISNULL( PRIORVALUE( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Sprint__c) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression:
AND(
ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.copado__Sprint__c} ), OR( ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.copado__Sprint__c}) ), ISNULL( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.copado__Sprint__c}) ) ) )

value.stringValue:
AND(
ISCHANGED( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Org_Credential__c ), OR( ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Org_Credential__c) ), ISNULL( PRIORVALUE( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Org_Credential__c ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression:
AND(
ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.copado__Org_Credential__c} ), OR( ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.copado__Org_Credential__c}) ), ISNULL( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.copado__Org_Credential__c} ) ) ) )

value.stringValue:
AND(
ISCHANGED( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Latest_Commit_Date__c ), OR( ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Latest_Commit_Date__c ) ), ISNULL( PRIORVALUE( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Latest_Commit_Date__c ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression:
AND(
ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.copado__Latest_Commit_Date__c} ), OR( ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.copado__Latest_Commit_Date__c} ) ), ISNULL( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.copado__Latest_Commit_Date__c} ) ) ) )

value.stringValue: AND( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Has_Apex_Code__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c ), NOT( ISNULL( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c )), NOT( ISNULL( [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Minimum_Apex_Code_Coverage__c ) ), [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c >= [copado__User_Story__c].copado__Minimum_Apex_Code_Coverage__c )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.copado__Has_Apex_Code__c} = TRUE, ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c} ), NOT( ISNULL( {!myVariable_current.copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c} )), NOT( ISNULL( {!myVariable_current.copado__Minimum_Apex_Code_Coverage__c} ) ), {!myVariable_current.copado__Apex_Code_Coverage__c} >= {!myVariable_current.copado__Minimum_Apex_Code_Coverage__c} )

Flow.label: On Story Modification
